mapper.select: select d1.designerid, d1.designerimage, dcount from (select distinct de.designerid, de.designerImage from designer de, requestdeal re where de.designerid = re.dealsellerId) d1, (SELECT r.dealsellerid as designerId, (NVL(r.rcount, 0))+ (NVL(s.scount, 0)) as dCount FROM (select dealsellerid, count(*) as rcount from requestdeal group by dealsellerid) r FULL OUTER JOIN (select dealsellerid, count(*) as scount from saledeal group by dealsellerid) s ON r.dealsellerid = s.dealsellerid) d2 where d1.designerid = d2.designerid and rownum <=3 order by dcount desc
